entry.title: khyatish14/bottom-sheet-stepper: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

entry.title: Bio-lock/BiolockEmbed: BiolockEmbed is a lightweight and user-friendly JavaScript library designed to simplify the integration of your BioLock iframe into a parent website. With an intuitive API, it streamlines the communication between the iframe and your web application while offering extensive customization options.
entry.content: BiolockEmbed is a lightweight and user-friendly JavaScript library designed to simplify the integration of your BioLock iframe into a parent website. With an intuitive API, it streamlines the communication between the iframe and your web application while offering extensive customization options.
